creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: small white plastic figure with large head, blonde hair, two mouths, and many green eyes sits in meditation position atop a green plastic orb covered with brightly colored flowers, each smiling at the center; orb comes apart revealing small CD supported on white base with blue swirl; underside of top of orb is decorated with white lotus with eyeball at center; sits on silver base with eyeballs
title: Oval on a Cosmos Ball
